Immelman

Online Multiplayer dogfight game.

Github Repository

Windows Download

Mac Download

Controls

  • Roll: A & D
  • Elevator: W & S
  • Rudder: Q & E
  • Throttle: Z & X
  • FreeLook: C
  • Fire: L-Mouse
  • Boost: R-Mouse
  • Brake: B
